org.ngi

Class NodeOutput

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ngi.Element
      • org.ngi.NodeTile
        • org.ngi.NodeOutput
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BooleanOutput, ExpressionOutput, FragmentSpecOutput, NumberOutput, OperationOutput, RangeOutput, VariableOutput, VectorOutput

    public class NodeOutput
extends NodeTile
implements java.io.Serializable
    Base class for all NodeOutputs. This class manages output connections and value storage and passing.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
